name: Dark Kingdom
short_description: The classic text-RPG in Russian. Open world can offer you to do almost anything, with a "natural" dialogue and dissemination "rumors" system in the game world allows players to dive deeper into fantasy-comedy atmosphere of the game. The game was not brought up to production-stable state, and is unlikely to ever be, but the open architecture allows anyone, not even familiar with the programming, easy to change the game world by editing configuration files, making any changes to it, where only player's imagination is the limit. From new items and NPC dialogs to change patterns of relationships. All in your hands :-)
summary: Dark Kingdom is a text-only open-world RPG
